description:
The rumor going around the internet was that popular flower Ye Kehuan were at odds with film queen Jiang Laien, exhausting the fans of the two who were tearing each other apart. The result …… during a variety show recording, the host asked Ye Kehuan to open her contacts and call the subject of the net rumors, Jiang Laien. After a moment, the phone was connected …… Ye Kehuan picked up the phone: “Hey, what are you doing now?” On the other end, Jiang Laien replied, softly: “Thinking about you, ah~” The audience: !

Due to her love of acting, Ye Kehuan braved parental opposition to enter the entertainment industry, starting with a low-profile at the bottom. Unexpectedly, she was made black, mocked as poor, and also speculated to be selling her ** to get resources to the top. Until one day, a program team went to Ye Kehuan that castle-like home to shoot reality show, only to find that Ye Kehuan was most certainly not in lack of any money …… Netizens: (╯‵□′)╯︵┻┻  Sister Ye, is your family lacking any dogs, the kind that eats, drinks, spends money, and speaks human words!>
